config.sprinklerBehavior.name: Sprinkler behavior
config.sprinklerBehavior.tooltip:
> Cluster: Groups sprinklers by nearby clustered tiles and tries to water as much as possible.
   Note: Sprinklers will no longer be able to be activated manually.
> Flood fill: OBSOLETE! Please use the Cluster-family behaviors instead!
   Custom-made algorithm. Tries to flood fill from the sprinkler/watered tiles.
   Will also change behavior if next to other sprinklers.
> Vanilla: Uses the default game behavior.
config.ignoreRange.name: Ignore range
config.ignoreRange.tooltip: If enabled, custom sprinkler behaviors will ignore sprinklers' range (calculated basing on their power and coverage shape).
config.waterGardenPots.name: Water garden pots
config.waterGardenPots.tooltip: Whether garden pots should be treated just like other soil.
config.waterPetBowl.name: Water pet bowl
config.waterPetBowl.tooltip: Whether pet bowl should also be watered.
config.compatibilityMode.name: Compatibility mode
config.compatibilityMode.tooltip: Patch the game code in a more mod-compatible way, at the cost of some performance.
config.cluster.section.name: Cluster options
config.cluster.splitDisconnected.name: Split disconneted clusters
config.cluster.splitDisconnected.tooltip:
Make another pass to split big clusters with disconnected parts into separate clusters.
This may come at some performance loss.
config.cluster.ordering.name: Cluster ordering
config.cluster.ordering.tooltip: Which clusters should each sprinkler prefer when choosing one to water more.
config.cluster.betweenClusterBalance.too:
Edge case handling for choosing which cluster to water more.

> Relaxed: May water more tiles
> Restrictive: May water less tiles
config.cluster.inClusterBalance.name: In-cluster balance
config.cluster.inClusterBalance.tooltip:
Edge case handling for choosing which tiles in a cluster to water.

> Relaxed: May water more tiles
> Exact: Will water exactly as many tiles as it should, but those may be semi-random
> Restrictive: May water less tiles
config.floodFill.section.name: Flood fill options
config.floodFill.balanceMode.name: Balance mode
config.floodFill.balanceMode.tooltip:
Edge case handling for choosing which tiles to water.

> Relaxed: May water more tiles
> Exact: Will water exactly as many tiles as it should, but those may be semi-random
> Restrictive: May water less tiles
